column2: The Kingdom of Columbia is completely controlled.\n
The Kingdom of Gotham is completely controlled.\n
The Kingdom of The Old Dominion is completely controlled.\n
The Kingdom of Carolina is completely controlled.\n
America was once the mightiest empire on the face of the Earth. As your realm grows in power, it is becoming more widely recognized as the true successor of America.
With America restored, the Men in Black would willingly serve a sufficiently wealthy and patriotic President.
